subject: Thanks for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend you money
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$259,000+ debt
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://swimaunland.com/
